skillTree.localised_description: A larger more powerful variety of its lesser bretheren

attributes.bullet_text:
Undead units cannot be routed, but take damage when their Leadership is broken.
	
	Undead units also have:
	 Fear and Terror Immunity
	
	Undead units may also have their hit points restored by special characters such as the Vampire Counts Necromancer.
This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
Speed and combat penalties caused by terrain are ignored by this unit.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

ui_effects.localised_text: Effect intensity increases with time spent engaged in melee.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit does not suffer any form of leadership loss and will never rout.

skillTree.localised_description: Yes yes.. Dragons are scary and all, but have you SEEN the thing he rides? Sigmar save us. -some poor Empire State Troop probably

	Undead units also have:

This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.
This unit can fly.

skillTree.localised_description: If anything, this one has an even greater lust for life than they did before their death.

related_attributes.bullet_text: Even when performing the most fatiguing actions, this unit never loses vigour.

skillTree.localised_description: If they wont move, make them.

ui_effects.localised_text: Explosion does not affect friendly troops

skillTree.localised_description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.localised_description: It's An Endless Abyss
This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.
Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
Creatures with tough hides or some kind of natural armour are tough nuts to crack - even a powerful attack may fall foul of their thick-skin.
Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, its not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!
Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.
The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.
A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.
A hybrid of familar and new magics, the disiples of abhorash have new and powerful tools to stay in the fight.

target_if: Hit point replenishment cap not reached
Not on or below a platform

skillTree.localised_description: Many mortal champions change their attitude when their proud challenge is accepted by a dark creature whose very eyes are the eyes of death
Using a combination of their great strength and amazing speed, its easy for a Vampire to create a gap in their opponents guard.
This champion extols discipline and fear away from the battlefield as much as on it.

effects.description: Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 10%
Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 20%
Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 30%

skillTree.localised_description: The locals take notice and will be inspired or frightened into action.

effects.description: Spread Corruption action: Vampiric corruption is increased by an additional 1
Spread Corruption action: Vampiric corruption is increased by an additional 2
Spread Corruption action: Vampiric corruption is increased by an additional 3

skillTree.localised_description: "If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

Assault Garrison action: Additional 30% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 5% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 12% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 21% chance of wounding target

skillTree.localised_description: Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 3% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Ever searching for a worthy opponent, only the most skilled shall ever have a chance of drawing blood from I
Fury is a tool, to revel in it is weakness.
Through eons of violence, one must be careful lest they fall into insanity. Pledge yourself instead to the thrill of perfection and not the act itself
The cattle rise and fall like grains of sand, we however, endure forever in our pursuit of total martial mastery.
